components.description:
A smiling yellow face with glasses, often with teeth showing, originally buck teeth on most platforms.

While this emoji is often used by people calling themselves nerds in a self-deprecating way, the nerdy glasses paired with buck teeth can, and often does, evoke anti-Asian stereotypes. The fact that the default color of emoji faces is yellow further pushes this emoji into racist "yellowface" territory.

Some platforms have redesigned nerd face over time to not have buck teeth, perhaps in acknowledgement of the harm this imagery may cause. Google, Facebook, WhatsApp, and JoyPixels originally featured designs with buck teeth but have since changed (or completely removed) the teeth on nerd face.

Apple, Twitter, Microsoft, Samsung, and other platforms still use designs for this emoji that include buck teeth.
components.title: Nerd Face

title: Nerd Face

version.description: The Unicode Consortium has approved the following 41 emoji characters as part of Unicode 8.0, released on June 17, 2015. This is comprised of 37 new emojis, plus five emoji modifiers. Find out more about this update on the Emojipedia Blog.

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoticon faces
emoji_net_data.definition: A sterotypically ‚Äúnerd-like‚Äù face with glasses, and buck teeth. Nerd Face was approved as part of Unicode 8.0 in 2015 and added to Emoji 1.0 http://emojipedia.org/nerd-face/
emoji_net_data.name: nerd face

bn:00032600n: Part of the body at the front of the head
The face is a central organ of sense and is also very central in the expression of emotion among humans and among numerous other species.
Faces are the central sense organ complexes, for those animals that have one, normally on the ventral surface of the head.
The front of the human head from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear
The front part of the head, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth and the surrounding area.

bn:00057311n: Descriptive term, often used pejoratively, indicating that a person is overly intellectual, obsessive, or socially impaired
Nerd is a descriptive term, often used pejoratively, indicating that a person is overly intellectual, obsessive, or socially impaired.
A person who is intellectual but generally introverted
An intelligent but single-minded expert in a particular technical field or profession
An intelligent but single-minded expert in a particular technical field or profession.
